Package org.jcvi.jillion.core.util

Contains common utility classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Builder<T>
    Builder is an interface for the Builder Pattern.
    GenomeStatistics.GenomeStatisticsBuilder
    Interface for computing a Genome Statistic using the Builder pattern which allows you to delay adding elements to include in the computation instead of requiring them all at once.
    ThrowingStream<T>
    An extension of Stream but with additional methods that can throw checked exceptions, usually named throwingXXX().
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DateUtil
    Utility class for modifying the current system time, useful for testing or fixing the date to a specific moment in time.
    FileIterator
    FileIterator is an Iterator for File objects.
    FileIterator.FileIteratorBuilder
    FileIteratorBuilder is used to build a new instance of a FileIterator.
    GenomeStatistics
    GenomeStatistics is a utility class for computing different statistical measurements about genomes (for example N50).
    JillionCollectors  
    JoinedStringBuilder<T>
    JoinedStringBuilder is a Builder that builds a single String object from a collection of Objects that can optionally be concatenated with another "glue" Object and/or prefixed and suffixed with other Objects.
    MapUtil
    Utility class for working with Maps.
    MapValueComparator<K extends Comparable<? super K>,V>
    MapValueComparator is a Comparator that allows sorting a Map's keys based on the values mapped to the keys.
    MultipleWrapper<T>
    MultipleWrapper uses dymanic proxies to wrap several instances of an interface.
    ObjectsUtil
    ObjectsUtil contains common utility functions on Objects.
    Pair<T,U>
    A tuple pair used to return a 2-tuple return value.
    SingleThreadAdder
    SingleThreadAdder is an equivalent class to LongAdder but is not threadsafe.
    UnsignedByteArray
    UnsignedByteArray is a class that stores arrays of unsigned bytes (opposed to signed bytes like byte[] does.
    UnsignedIntArray
    UnsignedIntArray is a class that stores arrays of unsigned ints (opposed to signed bytes like int[] does.
    UnsignedShortArray
    UnsignedShortArrayv is a class that stores arrays of unsigned shorts (opposed to signed bytes like short[] does.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MultipleWrapper.ReturnPolicy
    Since methods can only return a single return value, only one of the wrapped methods can be returned to the caller (even though they will all be called).

Package org.jcvi.jillion.core.util Description

Contains common utility classes. Many of these classes should be included in the Java SDK but for some reason aren't.
